test_cases.name: TC-BQ1. Given party lookup is skipped and bulk quotes request is submitted, When receiver fsp fails the entire batch and sends the error, Then the PUT response should have error details about the transfer.

assertions.description: Check that the response has an http status code of 500
Check that the response has an error code of 4001
Check that the response has an error description of Error processing bulk quote

test_cases.name: TC-BQ2. Given party lookup is skipped and bulk quotes request is submitted, When receiver fsp times out while sending bulk quotes reponse, Then the PUT response should have error details about timeout.

assertions.description: Check response has quote result for first transfer

test_cases.name: TC-BQ3. Given there are 2 transfers in the bulk request and acceptParty is true for both the transfers, When the receiver fsp sends success response for first quote and failure for the second quote, Then the PUT response should have details of success and failure for both the quotes.

assertions.description: Check response has quote result for first quote result
Check response has ilpPacket and condition for first quote result
Check response has error code for second quote result
Check response has error description for second quote result

test_cases.name: TC-BQ5. Given there are 2 transfers in the bulk request, When the sender fsp sends the acceptParty:true for 1 transfer and acceptParty:false for the second transfer, Then the PUT response should have details of the 1 quote for which the acceptParty:true response was sent.

assertions.description: Check response has quote result for first transfer
Check response has ilpPacket and condition for first transfer

test_cases.name: TC-BQ9. Given the transfers in the bulk request have 2 different receiver fsp ids, When one of the receivers sends an error, Then the PUT response should have details of the 2 transfers with success and failure details.

assertions.description: Check success response has ilpPacket and condition for first transfer
Check failure quote response has error code and error description

test_cases.name: TC-BQ10. Given the transfers in the bulk request have 2 different receiver fsp ids, When both of the receivers sends an error, Then the PUT response should have details of failure details of all the 4 transfers.

assertions.description: Check first quote has an error
Check second quote has an error
Check third quote has an error
Check fourth quote has an error

test_cases.name: TC-BQ11. Given there are 2 transfers in the bulk request with different receiver fsp ids, When one of the receivers timesout, Then the PUT response should have details of the 2 transfers with success and timeout details.
